TestCase.name: testFetch0WithoutOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable FETCH FIRST 0 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(fetch=[0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Sort(orderBy=[], fetch=[0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFetchWithOffset
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable OFFSET 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
LogicalSort(offset=[10], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[a, c]) +- Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=11, rankEnd=20], partitionBy=[], orderBy=[], select=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
